Html:
Hi, I cannot download the solution file. I click the link and nothing happens. I have tried Firefox, Chrome, IE9. 2 different internet connections, and 2 different PCs. The license agreement box does not open, and if I right click and open in new window,
 I get back to the download screen. The page that doesn't let me download is : http://nerddinner.codeplex.com/releases/view/45647#DownloadId=123725 Any idea's ? Or another place to get nerddinner_2.0.zip Thanks, Steve

Hmmm, strange. I just double checked it and it _seems_ okay. I wonder if there could be some security software on your local system that's preventing the T&C popup from opening. Otherwise you could get the code directly from the 'Source Code' tab. That's the best way to get the most current versions of the source.

Pete

Hi,

That’s what I thought… so I tried different PC’s, browsers etc… will try from home and see…

Thanks for the answer… will try tonight again, and will let you know…

Question re the Source code tab… is there a way to get all the changesets since the release ? Or do I download 1 by 1 ?

From: pmourfield [email removed]
Sent: Tuesday, May 24, 2011 5:18 PM
To: Stephen Knott
Subject: Re: Downloads not working.. [nerddinner:258815]

From: pmourfield

Hmmm, strange. I just double checked it and it _seems_ okay. I wonder if there could be some security software on your local system that's preventing the T&C popup from opening. Otherwise you could get the code directly from the 'Source Code' tab. That's the best way to get the most current versions of the source.

Pete
When you pull the source using a SVN client it gets everything at once.

Good point.. thanks…;)

From: pmourfield [email removed]
Sent: Tuesday, May 24, 2011 5:28 PM
To: Stephen Knott
Subject: Re: Downloads not working.. [nerddinner:258815]

From: pmourfield

When you pull the source using a SVN client it gets everything at once.

Got it working at home… obviously something on my network at work.

Thanks for all the replies.

Glad you got it sorted.
